name: Rando's Army
startIntroPart1: Hail, great Rando. Since you were a child your life had been fraught with hardships and unjustice, having grown up a underpriviliged orphan, abandoned twice by the people you looked up to, suffering gruesome facial mutilation at the end of another child's buzzsaw, and finally, rounding off your childhood at the time of the white flash, an event that caused the disappearence of all women, the collapse of society, and the slow, miserable end of humanity.
startIntroPart2: Rando! Although at the cost of much death and strife, you've restored order to Olathe and become it's strongest, unchallenged warlord. But Rando, all will be for naught if humanity slowly kills itself and the girl is never found. Can you justify your acts by saving the world? Can you build a civilization that can stand the rest of time?
declaringWar: I'm sorry it's come t-to this...
attacked: P-Please... more violence won't help anyone.

attacked: You just won't listen to reason...
defeated: The Communion of Cellophane prepared us for this. We all end up in the trash bag eventually. Don't you want to be ready for it?
cities: You think there's really something better?

name: Bloodmoon Tribe
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Culture, +1 Happiness, +1 Faith] from [Forest] tiles without [Improvement] [in all cities]

declaringWar: I never truly guarded this place. I live here as damnation for my gluttony and sloth, drenched in the blood of those I failed. I will not fail again. I cannot take it.
attacked:
The painted sky should tell you everything... 
She does not belong to you. 
This is the last bloodmoon tree. 
And I shall not let you take her.

declaringWar:
It was a corporate descision.
 Catharsis, omniscience, perpetuety.
Every kill is a step closer to infinity.
attacked:
None of you are getting it. 
The only way to go is infinity.
cities: In the desert I saw a creature. Naked. Bestial.
Who, squatting upon the ground, held his heart in his hands.
'But I like it because it is bitter, and because it is my heart.'

declaringWar: ...I got the Joy, Joy, Joy, Joy down in my heart, down in my heart. Down in my heart... I got the Joy, Joy, Joy, Joy, dooown innnn my heart! Down in my heaart tooodaay! Joy... Down in my heart...
defeated: Remember to take care of yourself. I'll check up on you soon.
cities: I've been waiting for a guide to come and take me by the hand.

declaringWar:
You side with a man, you stay with him. 
Can't do that, and you're a just fucking animal. 
You're finished. That's all there is to it.
defeated:
A vaquero never expects to die in a bed. 
All he wants is a place to come home to... just someone to come back to after his journeys...
